notesStmt.note: Torn endpaper. Usage stains. Occasional ink burn-though.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 19th century.

binding.p: Post 1800. Brown leather. Spine: 'Zechariah Al-Zahiri. Sepher Ham-Musar. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 11,337.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Acquired by exchange from Dr A. S. Yahuda on 10 October 1931: inscribed, folio [168v].
